snippet.title: Dead Island 2 - Cinematic Trailer (Official)
snippet.description:
Update: Deep Silver (the publisher for this game) was acquired by THQ Nordic in February 2018. So there is still hope this game will be released this year... or maybe next! Keep hope Buddies!! 

Game: Dead Island 2
IGDB: https://www.igdb.com/g/5nl
Game Release: 2018?


The Internet Game Database: www.igdb.com
